overview:
Internet worker, with big experience in classified sites and marketplaces:

Was the country manager for: www.deremate.cl www.demotores.cl www.zonajobs.cl

Now he works for El Mercurio Media Group, in charge of their Internet Business for local media: www.mimix.cl www.autolocal.cl

And he is working in a couple of projects more.

He has a lot of experience as a domainer too. Buying and selling domains is more than a hobby.
